title: Fred Astaire: puttin' on his top hat

description: Biographical documentary about the career of one of America's most loved and respected dancers, Fred Astaire, from his early days on stage with his sister Adele through to starring on film with his equally famous dancing partner, Ginger Rogers. Includes interviews with Ginger Rogers, Hermes Pan, Hal Borne, Gene Kelly, Pandro S. Berman and Rudolf Nureyev and excerpts from "The Gay divorcee", "Top hat", "Swing time", and "The Story of Vernon and Irene Castle" showing some of his most famous dance sequences. Narrated by Joanne Woodward.
